climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: LeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happen
#1 U.S. Gynecologist recommended tampon brand based on 2020 survey
Anti-Slip Grip on applicator makes the tampons easy to insert
Up to eight hours comfort and protection available in five absorbencies with Tampax Pearl tampons
Insert tampon applicator from the tip to the grip. To properly dispose, do not flush
body.description: Only Tampax Pearl tampons come in five different absorbencies, so you can move up or down to find what's right for you. Your flow is different every day, so your tampon should be, too. Whatever their absorbency, all Tampax Pearl tampons feature a LeakGuard braid that helps stop leaks with a core free of dyes*. Their FormFit design gently expands to your individual shape, while their smooth removal layer ensures amazing comfort.Tampax Pearl Regular/Super Absorbency tampons are free of perfume and chlorine bleaching, and clinically tested to be gentle on skin. Choose the level of absorbency that’s best for you and your flow, and consider switching between different absorbencies during your period. Find your flow combo with Tampax Pearl.*Braid has skin-friendly pigments.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Find your Flow Combo If your tampon leaks just after a few hours, try going up an absorbency size for better comfort and protection*. Simply go up from Light to Regular or from your current size up to the next higher absorbency. Only Tampax Pearl tampons have five absorbencies so you can find your flow combo. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs Find your Flow Combo If your tampon is uncomfortable to remove, go down for a lighter absorbency*. Choose the right tampon absorbency throughout your period for better comfort and protection. Simply go down from Ultra to Super Plus or from your current size down to the next lightest absorbency. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs

Outstanding Protection with Tampax Pearl LeakGuard Braid Tampax Pearl tampons feature a LeakGuard Braid that helps stop leaks by channeling them back into the core. Controlled Insertion The Anti-Slip Grip lets you hold the applicator securely, so you can insert the tampon with its rounded tip comfortably and easily. Smooth Removal Layer A smooth layer makes for easy tampon removal and outstanding comfort during your period. FormFit Protection FormFit design gently expands to fit your individual shape, so you can feel comfortable and confident during your period.

Frequently Asked Questions How does Tampax Pearl feel different than other tampons? Tampax Pearl Tampons have a special LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen, while a Smooth Removal Layer allows for easy removal. Plus, FormFit Protection gently expands to fit your individual shape. How long can I wear a tampon? You can wear a tampon for up to eight hours, but never leave it in for longer than that. If you usually sleep longer, set an alarm or just use a pad instead. How do I know which absorbency to use? Choosing the right tampon absorbency can make a big difference to be comfortable and avoid leaks. Take the Tampax Quiz on Tampax's website to learn more. What makes Tampax Pearl different from Tampax Pocket Pearl? Both Tampax Pearl and Tampax Pocket Pearl offer outstanding protection with a LeakGuard Braid to help prevent leaks. The main difference is that Tampax Pocket Pearl is compact in size so it fits in your pocket. When ready to use, extend the compact applicator to make it a full-size one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always a winner
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Tampax Pearl since they came out, and they are still my preferred tampon. I like the applicator finger grips, and absorbency is on the spot for the strength described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cotton with a job
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Does what it says it does. No toxic shock syndrome yet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used my hsa
reviews.reviewText: Didn't realize that you can use your HSA and FSA account on feminine products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I like this pack because it has super and regular in it which makes it easier to manage as your flow potentially changes during the course of your period.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Tampons
reviews.reviewText: I love these tampons, they fit comfortably, the applicator has never given me any issues, but my favorite part of these is the packaging. The way they are opened makes it SO easy to discard of wasted products back into the packaging. Love, love, love these.

reviews.reviewText: great product and fast shipping. Thank you
Better price than the pharmacy.fast delivery.good product .
Was not impressed that the package was crushed open, I perfer the box to be sealed.

I am always trying different tampons since I need a different kind almost every day of my period. From light, to super plus, to super, then to regular. I usually get Kotex but the way it opens up is not as great for preventing leakage. Unfortunately the super was not enough for my heaviest days unless I changed it every 2-3 hours. But I do think the string itself is much superior than Kotex (if that matters to you).
This is a great value for the price.. I never have to worry about running out every month... Great value pack
